title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive full-stack e-commerce solution designed to provide seamless online shopping experience. This platform includes advanced features like real-time inventory management, secure payment gateway integration with multiple payment options, user authentication and authorization system, product search and filtering capabilities, shopping cart functionality, order tracking system, and an intuitive admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users. The application is built with performance and scalability in mind, utilizing server-side rendering for better SEO and faster page loads. It also includes email notifications for order confirmations, shipping updates, and promotional campaigns. The responsive design ensures optimal viewing experience across all devices from mobile phones to desktop computers. Additional features include product reviews and ratings, wishlist functionality, coupon and discount management, sales analytics, and comprehensive reporting tools for business insights.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern and visually stunning portfolio website built to showcase professional work, skills, and achievements in an engaging manner. This portfolio features smooth scroll animations, interactive elements, and a clean, minimalist design that puts the focus on the content. The website includes multiple sections such as about me, skills with proficiency indicators, detailed project showcases with case studies, work experience timeline, educational background, testimonials from clients and colleagues, and a fully functional contact form with email integration. The dark mode toggle allows visitors to switch between light and dark themes based on their preference, with the selection being saved for future visits. The blog section enables sharing of technical articles, tutorials, and thoughts on industry trends. Built with performance optimization in mind, the website achieves excellent Lighthouse scores across all categories. The responsive design ensures flawless display on all screen sizes and devices.
